contentList.content: When this character's weapon lands a hit, it also <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CRAWLING_GNAW_SWITCH">Infects </LSTag> the target creature. Infected creatures become zombies when they die.
Your weapon attacks also deal [1]. On a ranged attack you apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ALCH_TOXIN_BASIC_CONDITION">Poison</LSTag> to them.

You are <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to Poison damage and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> or affected by disease as the vile poisons already flows through your veins.

You wield a sword infused with a virulent plague, its very edge pulsing with corrupted life. With each swing, you channel the sickness you've masteredâ€”infecting flesh, rotting spirit, and turning the fallen into shambling vessels of your will.
Charge forward into a Poisoned or Diseased enemy dealing [1] . If you hit the enemy, create a surface of toxins underneath your oponnent.
Choose a corpse, it explodes into a swarm that damages in a small area.
Destroy a corpse to unleash a devastating swarm upon your enemies. Creatures within get afflicted with a Disease that deals [1] and [2].
Your weapon attacks Infect enemies on hit. Infected enemies rise as Newborn Zombies
You can command a corpse to explode into a swarm that damges enemies in a small area.
Your body decays further, granting you more control over the plague; choose 1 of the following.
On a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, use your oponnents body to spread a large Poison surface.
Attacks you make ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison damage.

Swarming, biting locusts fill the air. They deal [1] and [2] per turn, make the area <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, and impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.

Swarming, biting locusts fill the air. They deal [1] and [2] per turn, make the area <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, and impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on an attacker, possibly causing their attack to miss.
Has no effect on creatures that can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.

Surrounded by plagued vines.

The ground within [1] of them is Difficult Terrain for everyone other than the plague blade and allies, halving movement speed.
Vines sprout around you for 5 turns, making the ground <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> for anyone but you.

Vines sprout around you for 5 turns, making the ground <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> for anyone but you. Enemies within the radius have to perform a Constitution saving throw, or become inflicted by Choking Blight.
Sorounded by plagued vines, the affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> using Strength and Dexterity.
Status to check if they fail a constitution check
You can let out grasping plagued vines from your body, that slow and may seep strength from your enemies.
Touch a creature to neutralise all poisons affecting it, and grant it protection against poisonous influences.

Grants <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison damage.
You can use your blight to shield an ally. Once per long rest you can cast Protection from Poison.
The resource used to cast Blighted Path
On combat start, you gain 1 Plague Charge.
